00014 TerrainNode::TerrainNode()
00015 {
00016 
00017     m_terrainTextureData = GRenderer::getRenderer()->getTextureMonitor()->getTexture("Data/textures/terrain_1.tga");
00018     m_terrainLightMap = GRenderer::getRenderer()->getGraphicsAPI()->newTexture();
00019 
00020     m_terrainDataCl = new TerrainData(513);
00021 
00022     m_terrainDataCl->generateUsingSineFaultAlgorythm(40, 10, 1, 30);
00023 
00024     //1 point, luminosity for each terrain point
00025     m_lightingData = m_terrainDataCl->getLightmapData();
00026 
00027     //3 floats per point for the normals of the terrain
00028     m_normalData = m_terrainDataCl->getNormalData();
00029 
00030         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < m_terrainDataCl->getTerrainLength(); ++i)
00031     {
00032         m_lightingData[i] = 0;
00033     }
00034 
00035     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_terrainDataCl->getTerrainLength() * 3; ++i)
00036     {
00037         m_normalData[i] = 0;
00038     }
00039 
00040     m_lightmapDirty = true;
00041 
00042     m_patchSize = verticesPerPatch;
00043     m_numPatches = m_terrainDataCl->getTerrainLength() / verticesPerPatch;
00044     m_patches = new TerrainPatch*[m_numPatches * m_numPatches];
00045 
00046     for (unsigned int zPatch = 0; zPatch < m_numPatches; ++zPatch)
00047     {
00048 
00049         for (unsigned int xPatch = 0; xPatch < m_numPatches; ++xPatch)
00050         {
00051 
00052             unsigned int zRowStart = (zPatch * m_patchSize);
00053             unsigned int xRowStart = (xPatch * m_patchSize);
00054 
00055             float* patchHeights = new float[m_patchSize * m_patchSize];
00056             float* patchUV = new float[m_patchSize * m_patchSize * 2];
00057 
00058             for (unsigned int z = 0; z < m_patchSize; ++z)
00059             {
00060 
00061                 unsigned int zMulValue = zRowStart + z;
00062 
00063                 for (unsigned int x = 0; x < m_patchSize; ++x)
00064                 {
00065 
00066                     patchHeights[(z * m_patchSize) + x] = m_terrainDataCl->getTerrainData()[(zMulValue * m_terrainDataCl->getTerrainLength()) + xRowStart + x];
00067                     patchUV[((z * m_patchSize) + x) * 2] = m_terrainDataCl->getUVData()[ ((zMulValue * m_terrainDataCl->getTerrainLength()) + xRowStart + x) * 2];
00068                     patchUV[(((z * m_patchSize) + x) * 2) + 1] = m_terrainDataCl->getUVData()[ (((zMulValue * m_terrainDataCl->getTerrainLength()) + xRowStart + x) * 2) + 1];
00069                 }
00070 
00071             }
00072 
00073 
00074             m_patches[(zPatch * m_numPatches) + xPatch] = new TerrainPatch(patchHeights, patchUV, m_patchSize);
00075 
00076             delete[] patchHeights;
00077             delete[] patchUV;
00078         }
00079 
00080     }
00081 
00082 
00083     File* shdFile = (File*) Filesystem::evaluateChild(Filesystem::getRoot(), "Data/Shaders/Terrain.shader");
00084     m_terrainShader = GRenderer::getRenderer()->getGraphicsAPI()->getShaderFactory()->loadShader(shdFile);
00085 
00086     if (m_terrainShader != 0)
00087     {
00088         m_terrainShader->setNumberOfTextures(2);
00089         m_terrainShader->setTextureName(0, "baseTexture");
00090         m_terrainShader->setTextureName(1, "lightMap");
00091     }
00092 
00093     scaleFactorX = 100;
00094     scaleFactorY = 100;
00095     scaleFactorZ = 100;
00096 
00097     m_ambientLight = 1.0f;
00098 }

00110 void TerrainNode::terrainAddVector(float* v, float* o)
00111 {
00112     v[0] += o[0];
00113     v[1] += o[1];
00114     v[2] += o[2];
00115 }
00116 
00117 void TerrainNode::terrainNormalize(float *v) {
00118 
00119         double d;
00120 
00121         d = sqrt((v[0]*v[0]) + (v[1]*v[1]) + (v[2]*v[2]));
00122 
00123         v[0] = v[0] / d;
00124         v[1] = v[1] / d;
00125         v[2] = v[2] / d;
00126 }

00128 void TerrainNode::terrainCrossProduct(unsigned int x1, unsigned int z1, unsigned int x2, unsigned int z2, unsigned int x3, unsigned int z3, float* auxNormal)
00129 {
00130     unsigned int l_terrainLength = m_terrainDataCl->getTerrainLength();
00131 
00132     float* m_terrainData = m_terrainDataCl->getTerrainData();
00133 
00134     float v1[3],v2[3];
00135 
00136         v1[0] = (x2-x1);
00137         v1[1] = -m_terrainData[z1 * l_terrainLength + x1]
00138                         + m_terrainData[z2 * l_terrainLength + x2];
00139         v1[2] = (z2-z1);
00140 
00141 
00142         v2[0] = (x3-x1);
00143         v2[1] = -m_terrainData[z1 * l_terrainLength + x1]
00144                         + m_terrainData[z3 * l_terrainLength + x3];
00145         v2[2] = (z3-z1);
00146 
00147         auxNormal[2] = v1[0] * v2[1] - v1[1] * v2[0];
00148         auxNormal[0] = v1[1] * v2[2] - v1[2] * v2[1];
00149         auxNormal[1] = v1[2] * v2[0] - v1[0] * v2[2];
00150 
00151     return;
00152 }

00155 float TerrainNode::getBrightnessAtPoint(unsigned int x, unsigned int z)
00156 {
00157 
00158     return m_lightingData[(z * m_terrainDataCl->getTerrainLength()) + x];
00159 
00160 }

00167 void TerrainNode::recalculateLightMaps()
00168 {
00169     unsigned int l_terrainLength = m_terrainDataCl->getTerrainLength();
00170 
00171     unsigned int light_type = slopeLighting;
00172     float softness = 5.0f;
00173     float max_Light = 0.95f;
00174 
00175     Vector3f lightVector;
00176 
00177     lightVector.setX(20);
00178     lightVector.setY(0);
00179     lightVector.setZ(0);
00180 
00181     float* m_terrainData = m_terrainDataCl->getTerrainData();
00182 
00183     //If its a height based light map just cycle through setting the colours to the value of the lightmap
00184     if (light_type == heightBasedLightmap)
00185     {
00186 
00187         float maxHeight = -10000.0f;
00188         float minHeight = 10000.0f;
00189 
00190         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < l_terrainLength * l_terrainLength; i++)
00191         {
00192             if (m_terrainData[i] > maxHeight)
00193             {
00194                 maxHeight = m_terrainData[i];
00195             }
00196 
00197             if (m_terrainData[i] < minHeight)
00198             {
00199                 minHeight = m_terrainData[i];
00200             }
00201         }
00202 
00203         float range = maxHeight - minHeight;
00204         printf("Range: %f\n", range);
00205 
00206         for (unsigned int x = 0; x < l_terrainLength; ++x)
00207         {
00208 
00209             for (unsigned int z = 0; z < l_terrainLength; ++z)
00210             {
00211 
00212 
00213                 float value = m_terrainData[(z * l_terrainLength) + x];
00214                 float result = value + range;
00215                 result = result / range;
00216 
00217                 m_lightingData[(z * l_terrainLength) + x] = result;
00218 
00219             }
00220 
00221         }
00222 
00223     }
00224     else if (light_type == slopeLighting)
00225     {
00226 
00227         lightVector = lightVector.normalize();
00228 
00229         for (unsigned int x = 0; x < l_terrainLength; ++x)
00230         {
00231 
00232             for (unsigned int z = 0; z < l_terrainLength; ++z)
00233             {
00234                 float tmp_ShadeValue = 0.0f;
00235 
00236                 //This double checks that the value is within the boundries of the array
00237                 if (z >= lightVector.getZ() && x >= lightVector.getX())
00238                 {
00239                     tmp_ShadeValue = 1.0f - ( m_terrainData[(unsigned int) (((z - lightVector.getZ()) * l_terrainLength) + (x - lightVector.getX()))] - m_terrainData[(unsigned int) ((z * l_terrainLength) + x)]) / softness;
00240                 }
00241                 else
00242                 {
00243 
00244                     //If its not then just make is very bright
00245                     tmp_ShadeValue = 1.0f;
00246 
00247                 }
00248 
00249                 if (tmp_ShadeValue > max_Light)
00250                 {
00251                     tmp_ShadeValue = max_Light;
00252                 }
00253 
00254                 m_lightingData[(z * l_terrainLength) + x] = (m_ambientLight * tmp_ShadeValue);
00255             }
00256 
00257         }
00258     }
00259     else if (light_type == positionalLighting)
00260     {
00261 
00262         for (unsigned int x = 0; x < l_terrainLength; ++x)
00263         {
00264 
00265             for (unsigned int z = 0; z < l_terrainLength; ++z)
00266             {
00267 
00268                 Vector3f vectorBetweenPointAndLight;
00269 
00270 /*
00271                 vectorBetweenPointAndLight.x = lightVector.x - (x + m_position.x);
00272                 vectorBetweenPointAndLight.y = m_terrainData[(z * m_terrainLength) + x];
00273                 vectorBetweenPointAndLight.z = lightVector.z - (z + m_position.z);
00274 */
00275                 vectorBetweenPointAndLight = vectorBetweenPointAndLight.normalize();
00276 
00277 
00278                 m_lightingData[(z * l_terrainLength) + x] = m_ambientLight;
00279 
00280             }
00281 
00282         }
00283 
00284     }
00285 
00286 
00287     //the -1 causes a little strech buut ensures the texture is a pow two (Terrain = pow2 + 1)
00288 
00289     printf("Terrain: Building texture from data\n");
00290     m_terrainLightMap->loadTextureData(input_data_float_luminance, l_terrainLength - 1, l_terrainLength - 1, true, m_lightingData);
00291     printf("Terrain: Done\n");
00292 
00293 
00294 
00295 }
00296 
00297 void TerrainNode::draw(Camera* cam)
00298 {
00299 
00300     ThreeDRenderLayer* ly = (ThreeDRenderLayer*) GRenderer::getRenderer()->getLayer(Layer_3D);
00301 
00302     if (m_lightmapDirty)
00303     {
00304         recalculateLightMaps();
00305         m_lightmapDirty = false;
00306 
00307         printf("Terrain: Recalculated lightmap\n");
00308     }
00309 
00310     GRenderer::getRenderer()->getGraphicsAPI()->pushMatrix();
00311 
00312         GRenderer::getRenderer()->getGraphicsAPI()->translateMatrix(m_position.getX(), m_position.getY(), m_position.getZ());
00313         GRenderer::getRenderer()->getGraphicsAPI()->rotateMatrix(m_rotation.getX(), m_rotation.getY(), m_rotation.getZ());
00314 
00315         if (m_terrainShader != 0)
00316         {
00317 
00318             m_terrainShader->setTexture(0, m_terrainTextureData);
00319             m_terrainShader->setTexture(1, m_terrainLightMap);
00320 
00321             m_terrainShader->activateShader();
00322         }
00323 
00324         float changeDistance = 150 * ((scaleFactorX + scaleFactorZ) / 2.0f);
00325 
00326         float cameraCurrentX = ly->getActiveCamera()->getPosition().getX();
00327         float cameraCurrentY = ly->getActiveCamera()->getPosition().getY();
00328         float cameraCurrentZ = ly->getActiveCamera()->getPosition().getZ();
00329 
00330         glScalef(scaleFactorX, scaleFactorY, scaleFactorZ);
00331 
00332         for (unsigned int zPatch = 0; zPatch < m_numPatches; ++zPatch)
00333         {
00334 
00335             for (unsigned int xPatch = 0; xPatch < m_numPatches; ++xPatch)
00336             {
00337 
00338                 GRenderer::getRenderer()->getGraphicsAPI()->pushMatrix();
00339                     GRenderer::getRenderer()->getGraphicsAPI()->translateMatrix(xPatch * m_patchSize, 0, zPatch * m_patchSize);
00340 
00341                 unsigned int patchCenterX = ((xPatch * m_patchSize) + m_patchSize / 2) * scaleFactorX;
00342                 unsigned int patchCenterY = 0;
00343                 unsigned int patchCenterZ = ((zPatch * m_patchSize) + m_patchSize / 2) * scaleFactorZ;
00344 
00345                 float xDist = (patchCenterX + cameraCurrentX);
00346                 float yDist = (patchCenterY + cameraCurrentY);
00347                 float zDist = (patchCenterZ + cameraCurrentZ);
00348 
00349                 float distanceFromCameraSquared = powf(xDist, 2) + powf(yDist, 2) + powf(zDist, 2);
00350 
00351                 float d = sqrtf(distanceFromCameraSquared);
00352 
00353                 unsigned int distanceOverChangeD = d / changeDistance;
00354 
00355                 m_patches[(zPatch * m_numPatches) + xPatch]->draw(distanceOverChangeD);
00356 
00357 
00358                 GRenderer::getRenderer()->getGraphicsAPI()->popMatrix();
00359 
00360             }
00361 
00362         }
00363 
00364         glScalef( 1.0f / scaleFactorX, 1.0f / scaleFactorY, 1.0f / scaleFactorZ);
00365 
00366         if (m_terrainShader != 0)
00367         {
00368 
00369             m_terrainShader->deactivateShader();
00370 
00371         }
00372 
00373     GRenderer::getRenderer()->getGraphicsAPI()->popMatrix();
00374 
00375 }
